update.description:
The `ign-gazebo` project name doesn't include its major version:

* https://bitbucket.org/ignitionrobotics/ign-gazebo/src/3696b763243aa1f54feeefc1745fb2486fb9de9c/CMakeLists.txt?at=default&fileviewer=file-view-default#CMakeLists.txt-6

This causes our homebrew build to fail when it can't detect the major version:

* [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=ignition_gazebo-ci-default-homebrew-amd64&build=1)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_gazebo-ci-default-homebrew-amd64/1/) https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_gazebo-ci-default-homebrew-amd64/1/

We may decide to change the project name, but in the meantime, we should update our CI scripts to handle this case.

* 9906b10: don't fail the homebrew build if we fail to detect a major version, just try to continue without a major version in the project name and hope we can find a formula alias
* e648c8c: allow `detect_cmake_major_version.py` to detect major version from project VERSION if it's not appended to project name

With this branch, the build still fails but for an unrelated reason:

* [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=ignition_gazebo-ci-default-homebrew-amd64&build=2)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_gazebo-ci-default-homebrew-amd64/2/) https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_gazebo-ci-default-homebrew-amd64/2/
update.title: Handle projects without major version in name
